name: Sea level rise
description: Modeled sea level rise after Halpern et al. 2008

description: Modeled sea level rise after Halpern et al. 2008

name: UV radiation
description: Modeled UV radiation after Halpern et al. 2008

name: High bycatch caused by artisanal fishing
description: The presence of destructive artisanal blast and poison (cyanide) fishing

name: Low bycatch caused by artisanal fishing
description: Statistics of low bycatch artisanal fishing using non-destructive practices

name: High bycatch caused by commercial fishing
description: Statistics of destructive commercial fishing practices by 5 different gear types (developed in Halpern et al. 2008)

name: Low bycatch caused by commercial fishing
description: Statistics of least destructive commercial fishing practices by 2 different gear types (developed in Halpern et al. 2008)

name: Targeted harvest of cetaceans and sea turtles
description: Targeted harvest of cetaceans and marine turtles, from Food and Agricultural Organization data

convert from harvest count to pressures score

name: Coastal population density as a proxy for intertidal habitat destruction
description: Coastal population density within 10 km of the coast

description: The presence of destructive artisanal blast and poison (cyanide) fishing

name: High bycatch commercial fishing practices as a proxy for subtidal soft bottom habitat destruction
description: Spatially distributed commercial catch data by fishing gear type, developed by Sea Around Us Project

name: Land-based chemical pollution
description: Land-based organic pollution at 1km2 resolution (as developed in Halpern et al. 2008)

name: Coastal nutrient pollution
description: Modeled coastal nutrient pollution based on Halpern et al. 2008

name: Alien species
description: The number and type of invasive and harmful invasive species in each marine ecoregion

name: Introduced species as a proxy for genetic escapes
description: Statistics on native or introduced species from the Mariculture Sustainibility Index (MSI)
children_notes: no gapfilling: if no mariculture, genetic escapee pressures=0; 2012a: gapfilled Trujillo score*MAR harvest2009; 2013a: gapfilled Trujillo score*MAR harvest2010;

name: Weakness of governance indicated with the WGI
description: Inverse of World Governance Indicators (WGI) six combined scores
children_notes: soverignty gapfilling
these are wgi_all values; to get ss_wgi must do (1 - wgi_all) after converting from WGI score: min=-2.49, max=1.98

name: Habitat extent * rank, per Carbon Storage habitats

name: Ocean-based chemical pollution
description: Ocean-based chemical pollution from commercial shipping traffic and ports and harbors

name: Ocean nutrient pollution
description: Modeled ocean nutrient pollution based on Halpern et al. 2008

name: Access to improved sanitation as a proxy for pathogen pollution
description: Percent of population with access to improved sanitation facilities

name: Trash pollution
description: Density of trash from coastal land and sea
